metadata.title: CVE-2021-3563 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in openstack-keystone. Only the first 72 characters of anapplication secret are verified allowing attackers bypass some passwordcomplexity which administrators may be counting on. The highest threat fromthis vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: keystone package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-01-03').
